mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_REPORT ( REPORT_ID, REPORT_TARGET_TYPE, REPORT_TARGET_ID, USER_ID, REPORT_REASON, REPORT_DATE, REPORT_STATUS, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_ID, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_ID, REPORT_TARGET_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #{reportId}, #{reportTargetType}, #{reportTargetId}, #{userId}, #{reportReason}, SYSDATE, 'PENDING', SYSDATE, #{createId}, SYSDATE, #{updatedId}, #{reportTargetUserId} )
mapper.select: SELECT REPORT_ID AS reportId, REPORT_TARGET_TYPE AS reportTargetType, REPORT_TARGET_ID AS reportTargetId, USER_ID AS userId, REPORT_REASON AS reportReason, REPORT_DATE AS reportDate, REPORT_STATUS AS reportStatus, CREATE_DATE AS createDate, CREATE_ID AS createId, UPDATED_DATE AS updatedDate, UPDATED_ID AS updatedId, REPORT_TARGET_USER_ID AS reportTargetUserId FROM TB_REPORT WHERE REPORT_TARGET_TYPE = #{targetType} AND REPORT_TARGET_ID = #{targetId} ORDER BY REPORT_DATE DESC

SELECT r.REPORT_ID AS reportId, r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE AS reportTargetType, r.REPORT_TARGET_ID AS reportTargetId, r.USER_ID AS userId, r.REPORT_REASON AS reportReason, r.REPORT_DATE AS reportDate, r.REPORT_STATUS AS reportStatus, r.REPORT_TARGET_USER_ID AS reportTargetUserId,
-- ✅ [수정됨] CASE문 데이터 타입 일치시킴 (TO_NUMBER 추가) CASE -- 게시글 신고일 경우 (REPORT_TARGET_ID는 이미 NUMBER) WHEN r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE IN ('moviepost', 'musicpost', 'boardpost') THEN r.REPORT_TARGET_ID
-- 댓글 신고일 경우 (TARGET_ID가 VARCHAR라면 TO_NUMBER로 숫자로 변환) WHEN r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE IN ('moviecomment', 'musiccomment', 'boardcomment') THEN TO_NUMBER(c.TARGET_ID)
ELSE 0 END AS postId,
-- 신고된 내용 미리보기 CASE WHEN r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE = 'moviepost' THEN m.MOVIE_POST_TITLE WHEN r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE = 'musicpost' THEN mu.MUSIC_POST_TITLE WHEN r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE = 'boardpost' THEN b.COMMUNITY_TITLE WHEN r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE IN ('moviecomment', 'musiccomment', 'boardcomment') THEN c.COMMENT_TEXT ELSE '내용 없음' END AS postTitleOrCommentText
FROM TB_REPORT r
-- 게시글 조인 LEFT JOIN TB_MOVIE_POST m ON r.REPORT_TARGET_ID = m.MOVIE_POST_ID AND r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE = 'moviepost' LEFT JOIN TB_MUSIC_POST mu ON r.REPORT_TARGET_ID = mu.MUSIC_POST_ID AND r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE = 'musicpost' LEFT JOIN TB_COMMUNITY b ON r.REPORT_TARGET_ID = b.COMMUNITY_POST_ID AND r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE = 'boardpost'
-- 댓글 조인 LEFT JOIN TB_COMMENT c ON r.REPORT_TARGET_ID = c.COMMENT_ID AND ( (r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE = 'moviecomment') OR (r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE = 'musiccomment') OR (r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE = 'boardcomment') )
ORDER BY r.REPORT_DATE DESC
